title: Fight for Peace and Love - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mature   Mystery   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Childhood Friends   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Game Ranking System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Naive Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   R*pe   Straight Uke   System Administrator   World Hopping
author: Xī Zǐxù   西子绪
description:
Shou: I am still alone because I am obsessed with building socialism.

Gong: I am still alone because I haven’t met you.

Then they encountered Bai Luoluo finally having the chance to plant the Peace & Love seeds all over the world.

Qin Baichuan: Come on, plant more seeds in me.

This is a story about an shou striving for influencing the whole world but instead changing himself in the end.

The gong told the shou: I cheated on you.

Shou: If you return, I will still be with you.

The gong told the shou: I am going to marry.

Shou: As long as you are divorced, I will still be with you.

The gong told the shou: I need your heart to be a guiding drug.

Shou: I am willing to be with you next life.>
